lead_paragraph: Joaquin Arias, the newest Met, has a place in Yankees lore as the minor leaguer sent to Texas with Alfonso Soriano in the 2004 trade for Alex Rodriguez. The significant part of his involvement, though, was that the Rangers chose Arias over Robinson Cano.
snippet: The Mets' trade for Joaquin Arias, the player Texas chose instead of Robinson Cano in the 2004 A-Rod trade with the Yankees.

headline.main: Newest Met Is a Footnote in Yankees History

abstract: The Mets' trade for Joaquin Arias, the player Texas chose instead of Robinson Cano in the 2004 A-Rod trade with the Yankees.
